name: Football World Master 2
description:
******************
FREE FULL GAME
NO ADS
*****************

FOOTBALL WORLD MASTER IS BACK WITH A NEW VERSION FULL OF NEW FEATURES

- - - - - - - - - - - - -

Buy clubs and national teams from around the world.
Invest your money in transfers, staff members, training centre and stadium to improve the team.
Take your clubs to the top of world football or sell them and pocket the cash.
Manage several clubs at the same time to multiply your earnings.

The road ahead is long but your goal is within your reach: win the most beautiful trophies and become THE MASTER OF WORLD FOOTBALL!

- - - - - - - - - - - - -

NEW FEATURES

- 45 new playable countries.
- 600 new clubs.
- 82 national teams.
- 85 new national and international competitions.
- Put your clubs up for sale and receive immediate offers to buy them.
- Declare your interest in the teams you want to buy.
- Manage the cohesion and fitness of your teams.
- Exploit new roles and attributes of your staff members.
- Track the performance of top clubs around the world.

- - - - - - - - - - - - -

YOU ARE THE BOSS

Your role is not to coach the team. Your role is to make the decisions:
- Change the coach or give him the means to progress.
- Accept or reject transfers and contract renewals.
- Choose your sporting director; your marketing director and your fitness trainer.
- Listen to the advice of your staff and accept or reject their requests.
- Invest your money in improving the training centre to improve the club in the long term.
- Price your stadium tickets and build a bigger one.

- - - - - - - - - - - - -

LOOK AFTER YOUR REPUTATION

Sometimes you have to choose between financial profitability and the sporting future of your clubs. Between your own interests and those of the fans. Between your wealth and your popularity. You will need talent, business acumen and good communication skills to become rich and popular.

- - - - - - - - - - - - -

A COMPLETE SIMULATION

200 competitions in 82 countries.
1800 clubs and 82 national teams.
National and international competitions from 5 continents.

- - - - - - - - - - - - -

BUY AT THE RIGHT TIME, SELL AT THE RIGHT PRICE

Winning trophies will make you money but nothing is more profitable than selling a club after you have improved it.

- - - - - - - - - - - - -

THE POPULARITY OF YOUR CLUBS WILL DEFINE YOUR POPULARITY

The fervour of the fans is a central element of the game. If you make your decisions only to improve the profitability of your clubs, your popularity will drop and your stadiums will empty. But give a club the means to win trophies and you will become the idol of the city.
